extensionDescription.message: The TAAR v3 (Telemetry-Aware Addon Recommender) extension is automatically installed by Mozilla to help us evaluate prototype improvements to the about:addons user experience. To change your study enrollment preferences please navigate to about:studies. More information about the TAAR project can be found at https://github.com/mozilla/taar

buttonTitle.description: Description shown on the toolbar when hovered. DO NOT localise 'Mozilla'.
